title: Quiz
content:
Chapter Quiz

Answer the following questions to check your understanding of this chapter's topics.

questions.question: In the context of 'Dataviz Integrations', which statement about altair advanced interactions is most accurate?
choices: Altair Advanced Interactions always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Altair Advanced Interactions is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Altair Advanced Interactions is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Altair Advanced Interactions only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Altair Advanced Interactions is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.

questions.question: In the context of 'Dataviz Integrations', which statement about plotly + streamlit patterns is most accurate?
choices: Plotly + Streamlit Patterns always requires external services to work in Streamlit.
Plotly + Streamlit Patterns is useful in some cases, but you should evaluate complexity and UX trade-offs.
Plotly + Streamlit Patterns is deprecated and should be avoided in all Streamlit apps.
Plotly + Streamlit Patterns only works when running Streamlit in Docker.
questions.explanation: Plotly + Streamlit Patterns is a powerful pattern, but like most advanced techniques, it should be used judiciously with attention to user impact and maintainability.
